results.text: Imvebbôen n ugdud n Ferâun, nnan: "day a ppeooev Musa akked ugdud is, ad ssefsaden di tmurt, a kwen ooen, keçç akked iôebbiten ik"? Inna: "a nene$ arrac nnsen, a nessider tilawin nnsen. Nekwni, sennig sen, d iqehhaôen".
Inna Musa i ugdud is: "ppret afus n Öebbi, u ûebôet. Tamurt, war ccekk, n Öebbi. A p iwôet win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Taggara i wid ipêezziben".
Nnan: "njaf uqbel a $ d tasev, u deffir tisin ik". Inna: "amar Mass nnwen ad Ine$ acengu nnwen, a kwen Irr d igensas di tmurt, ad Iwali amek ara txedmem".
Newwet, d$a, lois n Ferâun s iseggwasen n llaé, akked nneqs n ppemôa, amar a d mmektin.
Ma iusa ten id ise$, ad inin: "nne$ wagi". Ma tusa ten id tucmip, a p sbibben i Musa akked wid illan yides. Ayen iveôôun yidsen, day maççi ar Öebbi kan? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen.
Nnan: " wicqa assekni ara d tawiv, ur a$ tepseêêirev yis. Nekwni, ur neppamen yisek".
Nuzen asen aêemmal, ajôad, tilkin, imqweôqwôen, idammen, d issekniyen ifeûlen. Sme$wôen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen.
